org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.gui.panel

Class DataPortAlignmentPanel.DataPortAlignmentTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.gui.panel.DataPortAlignmentPanel.DataPortAlignmentTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    DataPortAlignmentPanel

    private static class DataPortAlignmentPanel.DataPortAlignmentTile
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Small panel for one data port. Contains button to open data port details dialogue and up/down buttons to align the ports of the current activity with the ports of the replacement activity.
    Author:
    clc
